text: Simois Colles is a region of colles (hills) in the northwest of Phaethontis quadrangle of Mars. It is located around 37.72 ° south latitude, and 176.59° west longitude. The region is across, and was named after an albedo feature. Map of Eridania Lake, including the area of Simois Colles == References == == External links == * Category:Phaethontis quadrangle
title: Simois Colles
